entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:57 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 01:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -12.5°C
Pressure: 100.0 kPa
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -14.5°C
Wind: NNE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning early this evening. Local amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
